## GAD-7 vs APSD

Psychologists and researchers often face challenges when comparing different assessments like Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and the subscale of the Antisocial Process Screening Device (APSD). Although the process of harmonisation - matching similar items from distinct questionnaires - lends itself to subjective interpretations and tedious routines, software like Harmony simplifies and adds a higher accuracy level to it. When you find yourself in a GAD-7 vs APSD scenario, Harmony's capabilities to use expansive language models to match and compare questionnaire items comes in handy. The GAD-7 vs APSD comparison becomes undoubtedly more manageable using Harmony. With its ability to generate a percentage match between every matching item in GAD-7 and APSD, it takes out subjective human error. The convenience extends to being able to select instruments from Harmony's database or input your personalized instruments by dragging and dropping PDF files into https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app. A direct comparison of the GAD-7 vs APSD items in English can expedite your research and enhance your findings' accuracy. Harmony's advantage is its ability to offer insight across multiple languages, thereby increasing its scope and efficiency. When conducting a GAD-7 vs APSD analysis, Harmony could establish connections across language constructs, thereby promoting a global understanding of the analytics. Its credible application of natural language processing and AI technologies makes Harmony the go-to tool for psychologists and researchers worldwide.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and APSD

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and APSD into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just APSD into Harmony</a> - compare APSD with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
